title: Did the Founding Fathers base the United States on God and Christianity? - Quora
tags: Founding Fathers of the United States
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: During the time that the United States was founded, religious factions were a large part of the culture, especially Christianity. Although not all of the founding fathers were Christian (some were simply deists), Christianity and the concept of God played a large role in the constructing of the nation.
